@usedefaults

{{timestamp}}
@block
@row
h2. Repository: [$$repo|/cockpit/Repo?repo=$$repo]

@col 6
h2. Links:
* [Templates|cockpit/Templates?ayspath=$$repo]
* [Instances|cockpit/Instances?ayspath=$$repo]
* [Blueprints|cockpit/Blueprints?ayspath=$$repo]

@col6
h3. Actions:

{{actions:
- display: Delete this repository
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/deleteRepo
  navigateback: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo

- display: Execute blueprint
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/executeBlueprint
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Init
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/init
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: force
    label: Force init
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Install
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/install
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: force
    label: Force install
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: async
    label: Async
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: True
      value: True
    - label: False
      value: False
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Execute action
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/executeAction
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: action
    type: text
    label: Action name
    placeholder: 'install'
    required: True
  - name: force
    label: Force
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: async
    label: Async
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: True
      value: True
    - label: False
      value: False
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Delete service
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/deleteService
  showresponse: True
  input:
    - name: repository
      type: hidden
      value: $$repo
    - name: role
      type: text
      label: Role
      required: False
    - name: instance
      type: text
      label: Instance
      required: False

}}
@colend
